context: Do you have recommendations for me from Cormac McCarthy?
Cormac McCarthy wrote Child of God is that something you are interested in?
I believe that one is Gothic Fiction? Do you have other Gothic Fiction to recommend?
Your Heart Belongs to Me is a Gothic fiction that you should check out.
That one sounds good! Who is the author?
Your Heart Belongs to Me is written by Dean Koontz, and she also wrote Watchers.
Awesome! When was Your Heart Belongs to Me released?
resp: Your Heart Belongs to Me was released 2008. I am telling you it's really a good book that you should try.
